channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Countryfile
channel.desc: John Craven and Charlotte Smith are in Lincolnshire at the height of harvest. It's one of the UK's most productive farming regions, but after a scorching summer, 2025's harvest could be one of the worst in recent years. What could that mean for farmers, our food and for the future of British produce? Also on the programme, Adam Henson meets the three finalists competing for the title of Young Countryside Champion at this year's BBC Food and Farming Awards.
